==Characteristics==
==Characteristics==
===Personality===
===Personality===
â
Ganon is depicted as the embodiment of evil.<ref name="pedia">{{cite web | url=http://www.zelda.com/universe/pedia/g.jsp#Ganon |author=Nintendo | title=The Great Hyrule Encyclopedia - Ganon | publisher=Zelda Universe |date=2006-01-01| accessdate=2007-06-03}}</ref> His roles range from savage beast to Machiavellian tyrant to godlike entity,<ref group=nb>His status as a deity is explained in ''Ocarina of Time'', ''[[The Legend of Zelda: Four Swords Adventures|Four Swords Adventures]]'', and ''Twilight Princess''. Ganon has temples dedicated to him and is worshiped as a god.{{or|date=January 2011}}</ref> sometimes in the course of a single game. However, he does show some knowledge of the fine arts, since he can play his own [[leitmotif]] on an organ in Ocarina of Time. He Believes That The Gods Blessed him with the triforce of power that he is doing whats best for his Gerudo tribe
+
Ganon is depicted as the embodiment of evil.<ref name="pedia">{{cite web | url=http://www.zelda.com/universe/pedia/g.jsp#Ganon |author=Nintendo | title=The Great Hyrule Encyclopedia - Ganon | publisher=Zelda Universe |date=2006-01-01| accessdate=2007-06-03}}</ref> His roles range from savage beast to Machiavellian tyrant to godlike entity,<ref group=nb>His status as a deity is explained in ''Ocarina of Time'', ''[[The Legend of Zelda: Four Swords Adventures|Four Swords Adventures]]'', and ''Twilight Princess''. Ganon has temples dedicated to him and is worshiped as a god.{{or|date=January 2011}}</ref> sometimes in the course of a single game. However, he does show some knowledge of the fine arts, since he can play his own [[leitmotif]] on an organ in Ocarina of Time.
Ganondorf is portrayed in ''Ocarina of Time'' as an ambitious, cunning manipulator, gaining the king's trust before betraying him and tricking Link into opening the Door of Time, allowing Ganondorf to access the power of the gods.
Ganondorf is portrayed in ''Ocarina of Time'' as an ambitious, cunning manipulator, gaining the king's trust before betraying him and tricking Link into opening the Door of Time, allowing Ganondorf to access the power of the gods.
